At a house called Mr. Nagasaki, a customer who has been patronizing since last year, there is a so-called "neat son" who is over 30 years old and always plays games in a dirty room without getting a regular job. You are ... One day when I was cleaning up Neat's room, I found a video on his PC that looked like a voyeur of my wife's ass being cleaned. is.
